name: dashboard-desktop-app
description: Dashboard Desktop Application with Electron, React, and Flask

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run start:electron"
scripts.build:exe: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:electron
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd Frontend && npm install && cd ../Electron && npm install
